remarks: The sign is a homomorphism from the finite symmetric group to the numeric signs.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Aug-2015.)
statement:
psgnghm2.s $e |- S = ( SymGrp ` D ) $.
psgnghm2.n $e |- N = ( pmSgn ` D ) $.
psgnghm2.u $e |- U = ( ( mulGrp ` CCfld ) |`s { 1 , -u 1 } ) $.
psgnghm2 $p |- ( D e. Fin -> N e. ( S GrpHom U ) ) $.
